text: Big and beautiful and safe area for the pubs to roam freely and run. Great place to meet other dog parents. It’s a quaint estate that’s well maintained. We got to know some new people and also the locals. Hope the barking don’t disturb the people staying in the area.

This is a great size for a dog run – not as big as the one in East Coast Park but definitely enough for a good run. It's also not waterlogged or muddy like some other dog runs we've been to. The downside is that we spotted quite a bit of dog poop not picked up. It seems like some people may just let their dogs run about in the dog run while they enjoy the park and they don't pay attention to the what their dogs are doing. So I would advise that you tread carefully in the space.

Bring my dog there almost everyday.
Has 2 water points and ample space for the dogs to run around.
Can be muddy after rainy days.
Well sheltered by trees from the sun.
Nice spacious dog run with trees for shade, benches for sitting and 2 waterpoints for dogs to drink
Great place for having a fun time with your dog
